headline: Pomerantz Law Firm Reminds Investors with Losses on their Investment in The Trade Desk of Class Action Lawsuit and Upcoming Deadlines - TTD

headline: Q4 Rundown: LiveRamp (NYSE:RAMP) Vs Other Advertising Software Stocks
summary: Quarterly earnings results are a good time to check in on a company’s progress, especially compared to its peers in the same sector. Today we are looking at LiveRamp (NYSE:RAMP) and the best and worst performers in the advertising software industry.
